tosdr.tldr: “Do not abuse this Service to invade the privacy and violate the rights of others. Abuse includes also the sending of unsolicited email (“Spam”) for which you explicitly agree to pay a compensation of 0.01 CHF per incident and recipient by making use of the Service.”
